events.name: SQL Saturday Singapore 2016 - August 20th
events.description: We are very happy to announce that we will be organizing 1st ever SQL Saturday event in Singapore on August 20th 2016. SQL Saturday events are a day long technical seminar / conference with top class speakers from across the globe will be providing technical content of excellent quality. List of speakers participating and their session title provided below •   Joe Young speaking on "SQL Server 2016 Stretch Database: top to bottom"  •  Andreas Wolter speaking on "SQL Server 2016 – The Evolution of In-Memory Technologies" •  Pinal Dave speaking on "Secrets of SQL Server - Database Worst Practices"  •  Vinod Kumar speaking on "Security with SQL Server - Things you never knew"  •  Kevin Boles speaking on "Know What Your Code is Doing to SQL Server!"  •   David Peter Hansen speaking on "Data Warehouse load performance with SSIS and SQL Server"  •  Glenn Morris speaking on "Data Storage and Analytics with Azure Data Lake"  •  James Beresford speaking on "Creating High Performance Tabular Models"  •  Krishna Deepak speaking on "Bleed Blue for the clouds – SQL Azure" •  Subramani Paramasivam speaking on "Think & work like a Data Scientist with SQL 2016 R"  •  Stefan Riedel speaking on "Automated and Repeatable Test Cases for SQL Server Development" Besides these our Singapore SQL PASS Chapter team ( Dharmendra Keshari,Khilitchandra Prajapati,Sarbjit Singh Gill, Nagaraj Venkatesan, Prakash Sawant, Harminder Sethi) will be delivering sessions too.  Indeed a terrific line up of world class speakers and interesting topics. Best part  is admission to the event is absolutely "FREE"!!! So, go ahead and register at https://www.sqlsaturday.com/549/registernow.aspx. Please note that sending RVSP in meetup DOESN'T CONFIRM your admission. Please register at SQL Saturday website provided above. Thanks!!! For more details on the event please check Our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/groups/sqlugsg/ our event page : http://www.sqlsaturday.com/549/EventHome.aspx Blog: sgsqlpass.blogspot.com
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, Meeting Room
